amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funding in the bill for use in administering or enforcing the Davis-Bacon wage rate requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 112-46 to prevent any funds from this act to be used to administer or enforce Davis Bacon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 238 (Roll no. 216).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 238 (Roll no. 216).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Sessions.
